GREETING_STRANGER.text: The little girl leans forward against the counter, clearly trying to balance on her toes. "Hey there! I'm Hazel. Welcome to Bottle of Wonders! How can I help you today?"

GREETING_AQUAINTED.text: Hazel says in her usual squeaky voice, "Well, hello again {character.name}. Good to see you again."

INTRODUCTION_RESP.text: "Nice to meet you, {character.name}. Let me know if you need help with anything."

PARENTS_RESP_EVASIVE.text: Hazel looks annoyed. "They're.... not here. I can help you though."

PARENTS_RESP_HONEST.text: "Oh, I haven't seen them in a loooong time. They died over a hundred years ago. This is my shop. If there's anything you need, I can probably get it for you."

INTRODUCE_SELF.text: Nice to meet you, young lady, I'm {character.name}.
